verses.text: I \w have|strong="H1732"\w* cried \w to|strong="H1732"\w* \w the|strong="H1732"\w*, O Lord, hear me: hearken \w to|strong="H1732"\w* \w my|strong="H1732"\w* voice, when I cry \w to|strong="H1732"\w* thee.

Let \w my|strong="H3068"\w* prayer \w be|strong="H0376"\w* directed \w as|strong="H3068"\w* incense \w in|strong="H3068"\w* thy sight; \w the|strong="H3068"\w* lifting up \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* hands, \w as|strong="H3068"\w* evening sacrifice.

\w Set|strong="H0834"\w* \w a|strong="H0834"\w* watch, O Lord, \w before|strong="H3117"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* mouth: \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w a|strong="H0834"\w* door round \w about|strong="H3605"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* lips.

Incline not \w my|strong="H8478"\w* \w heart|strong="H8193"\w* \w to|strong="H8193"\w* evil \w words|strong="H8193"\w*; \w to|strong="H8193"\w* make excuses \w in|strong="H8478"\w* sins. \w With|strong="H2534"\w* men \w that|strong="H3956"\w* work iniquity: \w and|strong="H2534"\w* \w I|strong="H8478"\w* \w will|strong="H3956"\w* not communicate \w with|strong="H2534"\w* \w the|strong="H8478"\w* choicest \w of|strong="H8478"\w* \w them|strong="H8478"\w*.

\w The|strong="H0834"\w* \w just|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* correct \w me|strong="H2803"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w mercy|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* reprove \w me|strong="H2803"\w*: \w but|strong="H7563"\w* \w let|strong="H6471"\w* not \w the|strong="H0834"\w* oil \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* sinner fatten \w my|strong="H8104"\w* head. \w For|strong="H3027"\w* \w my|strong="H8104"\w* prayer \w also|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* still \w be|strong="H0376"\w* \w against|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w things|strong="H5341"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w are|strong="H0834"\w* \w well|strong="H0834"\w* pleased:

\w Their|strong="H7896"\w* judges falling \w upon|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3027"\w* rock \w have|strong="H3027"\w* been swallowed \w up|strong="H7896"\w*. \w They|strong="H3027"\w* \w shall|strong="H3027"\w* hear \w my|strong="H3027"\w* words, \w for|strong="H3027"\w* \w they|strong="H3027"\w* \w have|strong="H3027"\w* prevailed:

\w As|strong="H3068"\w* \w when|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* thickness \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* earth \w is|strong="H3068"\w* broken up upon \w the|strong="H0559"\w* ground: \w Our|strong="H3068"\w* bones \w are|strong="H3068"\w* scattered \w by|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* side \w of|strong="H3068"\w* hell.

\w But|strong="H3117"\w* \w o|strong="H3069"\w* \w to|strong="H3117"\w* thee, \w O|strong="H3069"\w* \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w*, \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w*, \w are|strong="H3117"\w* \w my|strong="H0136"\w* eyes: \w in|strong="H3117"\w* thee \w have|strong="H3117"\w* \w I|strong="H3117"\w* put \w my|strong="H0136"\w* trust, take not away \w my|strong="H0136"\w* soul.

Keep \w me|strong="H5414"\w* \w from|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* snare, which \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w laid|strong="H5414"\w* \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H5414"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w from|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* stumblingblocks \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w work|strong="H5414"\w* iniquity.
\w The|strong="H3680"\w* wicked \w shall|strong="H7218"\w* fall \w in|strong="H5999"\w* \w his|strong="H3680"\w* net: I am alone until I pass.
